content: hope you enjoy this pattern here are the materials used and terms used in this pattern if you have any questions feel free to send me a msg materials hook 3 5mm darning needle worsted weight yarn in yellow orange black grey and white stuffing safety eyes 6 mm scissors terms chain chain st stitch repeat * slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet two stitches together as one stitch to decrease
